title: Tested: OtterBox’s new recycled iPhone 13 MagSafe cases deliver a unique, grippy design
content:
Breaking into the scene of recycled iPhone 13 cases, OtterBox just launched its new Core cover lineup to start the year. Comprised of 50% renewed materials, the regrind build delivers a slim, yet grippy design. Though whether the environmentally-friendly focus is worth its $60 price tag is what we’re investigating in our latest Tested with 9to5Toys review.

more…

The post Tested: OtterBox’s new recycled iPhone 13 MagSafe cases deliver a unique, grippy design appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Going hands-on with the new OtterBox recycled iPhone 13 MagSafe case, we're seeing how the brand's take on a renewed cover stacks up.
